H0.text: What type of bird was the first released by Noah. Dove

H1.text: What type of bird was the first released by Noah. Eagle

H2.text: What type of bird was the first released by Noah. Sparrow

H3.text: What type of bird was the first released by Noah. Ravin

A4.text: The raven created problems, refusing to leave the Ark when Noah sent it forth

A5.text: the dove and olive branch came to symbolize the Holy Spirit and the hope of salvation
